participant_1.background:
I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths.
My first activity is checking my grades.
I like to spend rainy days in my studio, practicing my dance moves.
I would brag about being a good father and making my family happy.
i am a graduate student studying law.

participant_2.background:
I frequently drink chocolate milk, which is not very good for my weight.
I had to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy.
i am angry at my coworker.
I was once in love with a florist's son, but it couldn't work out because of my mother.
I need to balance my work and family life.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking. How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you. I am a graduate student studying law.
Oh, that is interesting. I have always been interested in law.
It can be very interesting, especially when you get into the cases.
I can imagine. I am a florist and I used to be in love with the florist's son, but my mother did not approve.
Oh, I am sorry to hear that. I am sure it was difficult for you.
It was, but I have moved on. I have a wonderful husband and two beautiful children.
That is great to hear. I am glad that you are happy.
Thank you. I am also angry at my coworker. He is always leaving his dirty dishes in the sink.
That is very annoying. I would be angry too.
I have talked to him about it, but he just does not seem to care.
Maybe you should talk to your boss about it.
I might have to. It is getting to be too much.
I am sorry to hear that. I hope things get better for you.
Thank you. I am sure they will
